title: Web Developer I
description: Creates plugins and customizes themes in WordPress and Moodle
Collaborates with a team of seven developers (Agile, Jira, Bitbucket)
Writes endpoints for an API built with PHP (Symfony and Doctrine)
Manages ten public facing sites including one WooCommerce store and two online learning platforms
Utilizes Amazon Web Services for hosting, caching, security, and domain management

title: Freelance Web Developer
description: Builds websites and customizes Shopify and WordPress themes for small businesses and non-profits
Contributes to open source projects and makes open source WordPress plugins and node packages
Conducts accessibility audits, addresses WCAG compliance issues, and advises for improved site performance

title: Mentor - Web Development
description: Hosts weekly meetings with a class of thirty new front-end web developers
Prepares live coding demonstrations of fundamental programming concepts in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
